__info_description__: Shows a quick reference of selected word from Wikipedia
open_full_article_in_a_new_tab: open full article in a new tab
check_popup: There is no unique answer to this word. Click extension button to see possible answers
coords_check_popup: Response is georgraphical coordinats. Click extension button on toolbar to see map
popup_def:
is the browser extension which help you quickly get the meaning of a word on a page.
Point cursor at target word and press Shift+1 to get short reference for it
pick_language: Pick language in which you want to receive responses from wikipedia:
pick_what_you_want: Pick what you want to receive as an answer
alt_settings: Maximum number of alternative responses (20 maximum):
